players.name: Alice
memory: Charlie: "I am sorry to hear Diana was killed last night. We need to work carefully to figure out who the mafia is before more of us are lost. Bob, Alice, what did you notice about Diana’s behavior or anyone else's yesterday?"
Bob: "Alice is the mafia. I investigated her last night and confirmed it. We need to vote her out now to keep the town safe."
Charlie: "Alice has not denied Bob's claim, which is suspicious. But we must be sure before voting her out. Bob, can you share more about how you investigated Alice?"
Bob: "Alice staying silent after being accused only adds to my suspicion. I am the detective and I trust my investigation results—Alice is mafia. We must vote to arrest her now to protect the town."
